characters.name: Edelgard
characters.tips: Edelgard is your main powerhouse; focus on Axes, Authority, and Heavy Armor. Prepare her for her unique class, Emperor, by prioritizing these skills.

classProgression.requirements: Axe D → C → B, Authority C, Heavy Armor B
classProgression.howLong: Fighter until Lv 10, Brigand until Lv 20, Armored Knight until Lv 30, Emperor for endgame
classProgression.tips: Train Edelgard in Axes and Heavy Armor early on to prepare her for the Emperor class.

characters.name: Byleth
characters.tips: Byleth is versatile; focus on Swords and Faith for a balanced approach. Take advantage of their unique class, Enlightened One, which blends offense and healing.

classProgression.requirements: Sword D → C → B → A, Bow C, Faith C
classProgression.howLong: Myrmidon until Lv 10, Mercenary until Lv 20, Assassin until Lv 30, Enlightened One for endgame
classProgression.tips: Focus on Sword and Faith to fully utilize Byleth's potential as Enlightened One.

characters.name: Hubert
characters.tips: Hubert excels in dark magic; focus on Reason and Authority to enhance his support capabilities and damage output.

classProgression.requirements: Reason D → C → B → A, Authority C
classProgression.howLong: Monk until Lv 10, Mage until Lv 20, Warlock until Lv 30, Dark Bishop for endgame
classProgression.tips: Focus on Reason to maximize Hubert's dark magic abilities, and prepare him for the Dark Bishop class.

characters.name: Dorothea

characters.name: Ferdinand

classProgression.tips: Prioritize Lances and Riding early to prepare Ferdinand for the Paladin and Great Knight classes.
